headings.usage: Use for all section headers, modal titles, and metric values. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, data tables, and form inputs. Excellent legibility for dense data.

mono.usage: Use for SKUs, Order IDs, and technical specifications.

accent.description: Signal Orange - Use ONLY for primary CTAs (Add to Cart, Request Quote)

landing_page.description: Asymmetric grid for features. Mix 2x2 squares with 1x2 tall cards.

catalog_page.description: Dense data display. Sidebar filters (w-64) + Main Grid (flex-1).
catalog_page.card_style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow until hover.

dashboard.description: Widget-based layout for Order History and Analytics.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle 'noise' texture on the Landing Page hero background to reduce digital flatness.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Manrope' and 'Public Sans' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. THEME SETUP: Configure tailwind.config.js with the colors provided above. Use CSS variables for flexibility.
3. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Tetris Grid' layout. Do not use standard 3-column rows. Make the 'Preferred Pricing' card span 2 rows.
4. CATALOG: Implement the 'Control Room' density. Use small text (text-sm) for the product list to fit more data. Add a 'Quick View' modal.
5. CHATBOT: The InfoConnect Chatbot must be a floating widget (bottom-right) with a toggle. Use the 'Glassmorphism' style for its container.
6. DATA-TESTID: Every button, input, and link MUST have a data-testid attribute (e.g., data-testid='login-submit').
7. NO GRADIENTS: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
8. SHADCN: Use Shadcn components for all complex interactions (Select, Dialog, Popover, Calendar). Customize their border-radius to 'rounded-md'.
9. LOGOS: If brand images are too abstract, use text-based placeholders with the 'Manrope' font (font-weight: 800).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8 instead of p-4).
Micro-animations on every interaction (hover, click, focus).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A).
Ensure all text meets APCA contrast standards.
